data.proxyObjectName: compact dark gray mechanical keyboard with one red keycap
data.utilizationMethod: Place both long edges between thumb and fingers, clamp firmly, lift the keyboard vertically, rotate the wrist a bit, and rest it flat again

data.proxyObjectName: green and yellow rectangular scrubbing sponge
data.utilizationMethod: Place the sponge green side up on the tabletop and move the brush tip across that surface in short strokes

data.proxyObjectName: wooden handheld brush with black bristles
data.utilizationMethod: Hold the wooden handle about 4 cm from the bristles with a tripod grip and execute tapping and dragging motions.
Place the mouse stationary, rest fingertips on its curved surface, and glide them from front to back following the arch
Hold the pen barrel between thumb and index finger near the clicker and press the retractable button rhythmically with the thumb
